main event: A round red to green object with a tail like a shooting star appeared at Paine AFB, Washington, on June 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object moved about 1/4 of the distance across the sky before losing its tail and becoming a high altitude bright object., It was observed for about 1-2 minutes., There were two military aircraft nearby, but neither saw the specific shining objects., The sighting involved different colors changing from red to green to yellow., The report suggests the objects were still being observed at the time.
sighted object: one round red to green object with a tail
witness description: None provided, but observers were military personnel.
